<root><template><title>RV</title><part><name>type</name>=<value>command

</value></part><part><name index="1"/><value>arma3

</value></part><part><name index="2"/><value>1.62

</value></part><part><name>arg</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>eff</name>=<value>

</value></part><part><name>gr1</name>=<value> GUI Control
</value></part><part><name index="3"/><value> Create a MP campaign display. The class name must be a mission collection declared in the configs; for example, <template><title>ic</title><part><name index="1"/><value>[[configFile]]&nbsp;>>&nbsp;"CfgMissions"&nbsp;>>&nbsp;"MPMissions"&nbsp;>>&nbsp;"Apex"</value></part></template><br>
If the class doesn't exist or isn't a mission collection, the display will be created empty.

</value></part><part><name index="4"/><value> display [[createMPCampaignDisplay]] class

</value></part><part><name>p1</name>=<value> display - [[Display]]

</value></part><part><name>p2</name>=<value> class: [[String]] - Mission collection class [[name]]

</value></part><part><name index="5"/><value> [[Nothing]]

</value></part><part><name>x1</name>=<value> <code>[[findDisplay]] 46 [[createMPCampaignDisplay]] "Apex";</code>

</value></part><part><name>seealso</name>=<value> [[createMissionDisplay]], [[playMission]], [[createDisplay]]
</value></part></template>
